mode_details

showAboutInfo

Function

Structure

Shell.Project

Type

val showAboutInfo : unit -> about_details

Syntax

showAboutInfo () -> details

Arguments

()

Values

details
A value of type about_details.

Description

This function returns the about details of the current project.
